Html:
First off, you guys are doing an amazing job with this project!  Thank you for your continued contributions to the code and to the Rawr community.

I have been attempting to locate details about the last few release versions of Rawr.  Up to this point, the most reliable source has been the Version Notes Wiki (http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=VersionNotes).  However, it seems that minor version notes aren't always listed here.  According to the Wiki the last release is "4.1.0", but I actually have a more recent "4.1.3.0" installed.

Is there a separate listing where I can more easily track what differences have been released?  Or is this simply a matter of code keeping ahead of documentation due to time constraints?

Thank you kindly!
I have not had a moment to update the web page. Version Notes can always be found in the program on the Welcome Window at launch.
The main Version Notes page has been updated, individual model status pages will take a little bit to update
